attributes.action: transfer no  further powers to the Welsh Assembly without a referrendum in Wales as the assembly has shown itself incapable of managing its finances efficiently and fairly. The majority of people in Wales do not support the assembly which is being forced on the Welsh population by politicians.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Welsh Assembly through NHS Wales are denying cancer patients the funding of essential treatment and potential life-saving scans which are currently available in England. Since their formation, the assembly has spent in excess of 250 million pounds of public money on its own infrastructure and the building of an opera house that cannot be reached by 50% of the population of Wales.  We believe that the NHS in Wales should take priority over all other expenditure and that an equal playing field should exist for cancer patients in England and Wales.
